description: Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Minimum GPA of 3.00 Must be enrolled full-time Preference given to an Accounting or Finance Major Preference to a student who works a minimum of 10 hours per week Preference will be given to a student who plans to pursue a career in Banking
